trends: There have been no other sightings in Primm
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving to Vegas from San Bernardino on the 15 freeway before entering Primm I am not sure if that is considered the Mojave or Sierra Nevada Mountains, anyway we were in the far left lane and saw a huge flash of light out of no where to far right north east of the freeway. My fiance the skeptic was driving and I asked did you see that? and he said he did. I searched to see if anyone else saw or reported anything but could not find anything online except for the Unexplained "Phoenix Lights" explosion caught live on news broadcast that happend in March 2012. Please tell me what this was.
